FunctionLayer.BillGenerator

Class CarportGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • FunctionLayer.BillGenerator.CarportGenerator

  • public class CarportGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to Generate / Calculate the BillLines associated with a carport

    • Method Detail

      • underSternsBredderFrontAndBack

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> underSternsBredderFrontAndBack(java.util.ArrayList<Category> categoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                                           WidthComponent carportWidth)
                                                                    throws GeneratorException

        Calculates the amount of under sterns brædder used in front and back

        Finds the best fitting board based on the length of the board.

        Starting with the smallest.

        Parameters:
        carportWidth - The width of the carport
        categoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed
        Throws:
        GeneratorException - An exception for when a generator fails

      • sternsBredderSides

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> sternsBredderSides(java.util.ArrayList<Category> categoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                               DepthComponent depthCom)

        Calculates the amount of stern bærdder needed in the sides.

        Find the amount of the biggest board that can be used. Then loops through all

        materials to find the board that best fits the rest.

        Parameters:
        depthCom - The depth of the carport
        categoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed

      • overSternBredderFront

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> overSternBredderFront(java.util.ArrayList<Category> categoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                                  Order order)

        Calculates the amount of over sterns brædder used in the front

        Finds the best fitting board based on the length of the board.

        Starting with the smallest. Then checking the rest, and finding the board that will need the least cutting

        Parameters:
        order - The order object to calculate from
        categoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed

      • RemInSidesCarport

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> RemInSidesCarport(java.util.ArrayList<Category> categoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                              DepthComponent depthCom,
                                                              WidthComponent widthCom)

        Calculates the amount of rems used in the carport

        Find how many rows based on the width. Then finds the amount of the largest fitting board that can be used. The rest is then calculated with the smallest first.

        Parameters:
        depthCom - The depth of the carport
        widthCom - The width of the carport
        categoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed

      • sperOnRem

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> sperOnRem(java.util.ArrayList<Category> categoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                      Order order)
                                               throws GeneratorException

        Calculates the amount of sper used in the carport

        Looping through all the materials finding the best fitting one that is shorter than or equal to the depth of the carport

        Parameters:
        order - The order object to calculate on
        categoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed
        Throws:
        GeneratorException - An exception for when a generator fails

      • posts

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> posts(java.util.ArrayList<Category> categoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                  Order order)
                                           throws GeneratorException

        Calculates the amount of posts used in the carport

        Loops through materials to find the best fitting posts based on the height of the carport.

        Parameters:
        order - The order object to calculate on
        categoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed
        Throws:
        GeneratorException - An exception for when a generator fails

      • perforatedBand

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> perforatedBand(java.util.ArrayList<Category> categoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                           Order order)

        Calculates how many perforated band used in carport

        Find the length needed to be covered. Add bands to cover the diagonal.

        Parameters:
        order - The order object to calculate on
        categoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed

      • UniversalBeslagRight

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> UniversalBeslagRight(java.util.ArrayList<Category> categoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                                 int sper,
                                                                 int remme)

        Calculates how many universal beslag of the right handside kind needed in carport sper * (remme / 2) - 1

        Parameters:
        sper - The amount of sper used
        remme - The amount of remme used
        categoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> UniversalBeslagLeft(java.util.ArrayList<Category> categoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                                int sper)

        Calculates how many universal beslag of the left handside kind needed in carport

        Just needs an amount equals to the amount of sper

        Parameters:
        sper - The amount of sper used
        categoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed

      • screwsForSternAndWaterBoard

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> screwsForSternAndWaterBoard(java.util.ArrayList<Category> categoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                                        Order order,
                                                                        java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> finishedList)

        Calculates the amount of boxes of screws need for stern of water boards

        First need to make sure we have the amount of waterboards.

        Desc: Længden af vand brædder / 13,5

        Loop through all box sizes and find the best fitting one.

        Parameters:
        finishedList - The lists of waterboards from another method
        order - The order object to be calculated on
        categoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed

      • screwsForUniversalBeslagAndPerforatedBand

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> screwsForUniversalBeslagAndPerforatedBand(java.util.ArrayList<Category> categoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                                                      Order order,
                                                                                      int amountOfbeslag)
                                                                               throws GeneratorException

        Calculate the amount of screws used for universals beslag and Perforated band

        DESC: 3 beslagskruer pr. beslagflade (3) (3*3). + 2 skruer i hvert spær som krydses af hulbåndet

        Then lopå through all box sizes to find the best fitting

        Parameters:
        amountOfbeslag - The amount of sper beslags used
        order - The order object to be calculated on
        categoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed
        Throws:
        GeneratorException - An exception for when a generator fails

      • boltsForRemOnPost

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> boltsForRemOnPost(java.util.ArrayList<Category> CategoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                              int amountOfPosts,
                                                              boolean withShed)

        Calculate the amount of bolts for rems

        DESC: 2 bolts need for each post

        DESC: isShed + 4

        Parameters:
        amountOfPosts - The amount of posts in the carport
        withShed - is the order with or without shed
        CategoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed

      • skiverForRemOnPost

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BillLine> skiverForRemOnPost(java.util.ArrayList<Category> CategoriesUsedInGenerator,
                                                               int amountOfBolts)

        Calculate the amount of skiver used for rems

        DESC: amount of skirver = amount of bolts

        Parameters:
        amountOfBolts - The amount of posts in the carport
        CategoriesUsedInGenerator - the categories used in this generator
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of BillLines with the materials needed

      • getAmountOfSper

        public static int getAmountOfSper(int carportDepth)

        Takes the carport depth and return how many sper is needed

        DESC: carport depth / 55

        Parameters:
        carportDepth - The depth of the carport
        Returns:
        int amount of sper

        of rows of posts needed to support the roof.

        Returns:
        int amount of posts rows
